description: A thick tome for researching bugs, which you're probably doing if you can see this.

name.str_pl: sets of blood magic research (animal blood)

description: A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, and other esoterica for research into magic.  These are related to the usage of animal blood.

description: A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, and other esoterica for research into magic.  These are related to the usage of human blood.
A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, and other esoterica for research into magic.  These are related to the usage of meat.

name.str_pl: sets of blood magic research (occult objects)

description: A set of documents, scribbed notes, musings, and other esoterica for research into magic.  These are related to the usage of strange objects.
